duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and contribute to SAP Central Finance (CFIN) Technical projects, including WRICEF development, reports, interfaces, conversions, enhancements, and forms.
Design and develop technical solutions for the integration of SAP S/4HANA with other systems using ABAP and SAP IDE tools.
Collaborate with multiple business streams to gather, analyze, and estimate effort for WRICEF requirements based on functionality scope.
Create and manage SAP Smart forms, Adobe forms, and SAP Scripts for printing and reporting purposes.
Implement technical enhancements and interfaces for various SAP modules, including SCM, LE, OTC, FIN, EWM, manufacturing, and more.
Participate in testing, defects management, cutover, and deployment activities for SAP Central Finance projects.
Distribute data among SAP R/3 systems using ALE/IDOC and User Exits for extended functionality.
